text: (LICIEEITET N e Level of risk Clinical predictors Major (cardiac risk >5%) Unstable coronary syndromes Decompensated CHF Significant arrhythmias Severe valvular disease Intermediate (cardiac risk <5%) Mild angina pectoris Prior Ml Compensated or prior HF Diabetes mellitus (particularly taking insulin) Renal insufficiency Minor (cardiac risk <1%) Advanced age Abnormal ECG Rhythm other than sinus Low functional capacity History of stroke Uncontrolled systemic hypertension CHF - Congestive heart failure; Ml — Myocardial infarction; HF — Heart failure; ECG - Electrocardiogram
